body: Hi, I'm Jacob<br id="null"><br id="null"><br id="null">Yes I got banned on purpose, no I don't care<br id="null"><br id="null"><br id="null">Just wanted to say hi to those who know me and get a chance to say hello to those who don't<br id="null"><br id="null"><br id="null">I'm out<br id="null"><br id="null"><br id="null">You can find me in the mineman pvp retirement home<br id="null"><br id="null"><br id="null">hmu on snapchat @canyounotkthx<br id="null"><br id="null"><br id="null"><br id="null"><br id="null">side note: I don't know where to put this post or if this shit is even legal anymore, so pardon me if I got lost in the clusterfuck
